title: Royal Central School of Speech and Drama
description: The Royal Central School of Speech and Drama is renowned in the sphere of higher education, and its brand palette reflects a rich diversity of theatrical expression and tradition. The colors range from a deep, classic '1B5692' blue, symbolizing knowledge and prestige, to the bold 'C32128' red, representing passion and creativity. Supporting colors like '43A756' green and '74A2D7' light blue add vibrancy, variety, and freshness, resonating with future possibilities. This palette draws inspiration from the world of performance and academia, conveying an institution that values depth, dynamism, and distinction.
